exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables L, n.

In environment H0 : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Prop), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L) (t0 : Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P n t L : Language M : Model v1, v2 : nat -> U M f : Functions L t : Terms L (arity L (inr f)) H : forall x : nat, In x (freeVarTerm L (apply L f t)) -> v1 x = v2 x Unable to unify "v2" with "v1".

exceptions.tactic: intros n t IHt ts IHts.
intros n t' IHt ts IHts.

exceptions.exn: The reference IHt was not found in the current environment.

In environment H0 : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Prop), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L) (t0 : Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P n t L : Language M : Model v1, v2 : nat -> U M f : Functions L t : Terms L (arity L (inr f)) H : forall x : nat, In x (freeVarTerm L (apply L f t)) -> v1 x = v2 x Unable to unify "v2" with "v1".

original: intros v1 v2 t H. induction t using Term_ind. -- simpl. apply H. simpl. auto. -- simpl. f_equal. apply Terms_ind. ++ reflexivity. ++ intros n t IHt ts IHts. simpl in *. rewrite IHt, IHts. reflexivity.
